thread.title: March 2017 overnight stay
thread.title_full: March 2017 overnight stay - Review of The GEM Hotel Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: charles9877654
title: March 2017 overnight stay
text: Great location, close to subway. Beautiful lobby, hospitable staff. Priceline billing was a little jacked up, it said I used a different credit card to prepay than I actually did , so things were confusing. Very stylish room, but small because it's NY. I think the hotel is a converted SRO.
